Instructions:
Install Fake GPS Application
Install fakegps application
Now enable your phones DEVELOPER OPTIONS by going in settings>about phone and tap on BUILD NUMBER repeatedly until your see developer option is now enabled
Once developer option is enabled go in there and select MOCK LOCATIONS and select FAKEGPS in mock locations
Now open Fake GPS application and search your location where you want to search for the pokemons. after that tap on the red location mark and select start GPS SERVICES and then select third option pokemon go.
Now Fake GPSwill be minimized and a joystick button will appear. its done now open pokemon go and enjoy it right from your home.
